animal.question: I go 'Meow!' and like to chase string. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I play with yarn.
🐈‍⬛ Some people keep me as a pet.

animal.question: I say 'Woof!' and wag my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🎾 I like to play fetch.
🏡 I protect your house.

animal.question: I say 'Moo!' and give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I eat grass in a field.
⚫ I have black and white spots.
🥛 You can drink what I make.

animal.question: I quack and like to swim in the pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🦆 I am a bird.
🟠 I have orange feet.
💦 I enjoy water.

animal.question: I say 'Baa!' and have wool. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I am fluffy and white.
🌱 I eat grass.
🧥 People use my wool to make clothes.

animal.question: I oink and love to roll in the mud. What am I?

hints.text: 🐷 I am pink.
🐽 I have a snout.
☀️ I like to play in the dirt.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🐘 I am very big.
🌎 I live in Africa and Asia.

animal.question: I roar and I am the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I have a big mane.
🥩 I eat meat.
😴 I sleep a lot.

animal.question: I am yellow and have a long neck. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I eat leaves from tall trees.
🦓 I have spots.
🌱 I am a herbivore.

animal.question: I am black and white and have stripes. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I look like a horse.
🌿 I eat grass.
🌍 I live in Africa.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, and help flowers grow. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am wet.
☔ You need an umbrella when I fall.
🌱 Plants need me to live.

weather.question: I am big and yellow and hot, and I shine in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I come out during the day.
😎 You need sunglasses when I am very bright.
🔥 I can make you feel warm.

weather.question: I am white and cold, and I fall from the sky in winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄ I am very cold.
☃️ You can build a snowman with me.
🧤 You wear gloves when I am falling.

weather.question: I blow and can move the leaves on trees. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 You can't see me but you can feel me.
🪁 I can help fly a kite
🍃 I make the leaves dance.

weather.question: I am grey and cover the sun and sometimes bring rain. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I float in the sky.
🌧️ I can be big or small.
☔ Sometimes rain comes from me.

weather.question: Sometimes after the rain, I appear with many colors. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet.
☀️ I need the sun to show.
✨ I am a bow of colors.

weather.question: I am a big storm with lots of water and wind near the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I can make big waves.
🌪️ I spin around and around.
🏠 It's safest to stay inside when I come.

weather.question: When it's hot, I might fall from the sky, but I'm frozen! What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am made of frozen water.
🤕 They sometimes fall during a thunderstorm.
🍬 I am bigger than rain drops.

weather.question: I am a very strong wind that spins in a circle and can be very dangerous. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I look like a swirling cloud.
💨 I can lift things into the air.
🏡 You should take cover when I am near.

weather.question: I am a layer of tiny water droplets in the air that make it hard to see. What am I?

hints.text: 🌫️ I am like a cloud near the ground.
🚗 You have to drive slowly when I'm around.
👀 It is difficult to see far away because of me.
